title: Bug 6536: Add Javadoc on field in TH does nothing
OB: When selecting "Add Javadoc" from the context menu on a field in TH, nothing happens.
EB: The action of selecting "Add Javadoc" should add Javadoc to the field.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the TH file. 2. Right-click on a field. 3. Select "Add Javadoc" from the context menu.
